work.description: Built a project in a hackathon called *COVID-19 Engine* with other team members, a web application with some machine learning implementation and a notification system for updating Corona cases in area and finished in Top-10.

work.description: Participated in a Asia-Level Hackathon organized by MLH (Major League Hacking) and Built a project *JoyCode* with other team members, a website which is used to teach code to kids (age 8-14).

inspiration.text: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
The important thing is not to stop questioning, Curiosity has its own reason for existence. I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
